ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] The Nameless server
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh jeez Fentus! I make one additional character and this is the grief I get!? ;) (although I Have been thinking about making a female dark elf warrior, and a
ygData.messageBody:
Oh jeez Fentus!
I make one additional character and this is the grief I get!? ;)
(although I Have been thinking about making a female dark elf warrior, and a
halfling rogue, and an iskar monk, and a dwarfen chicken farmer, and a 2/3
elf-1/3 troll bat guano seller, and an Orc who is a pixie dust addict, and
a Verant employee, and a straight person! (That last one would take some
real role playing! "Mmm, love them hot chicks! C'mon Ompa, let me show you
what a REAL man can do!"))

Stricken, human paladin of the 7th circle
Thundyr, wood elf druid of the 8th season

Gates, the eternal newbie of the 35th year


----- Original Message -----
From: "Joseph Normandin" <josephn@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 7:31 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] The Nameless server


> Hiya!
>
> We seem to ahve a pretty diverse group, class wise, so we ahve no "need"
> for any particular class. Go ahead and experiemtn with multiple
> charchters, god nows many of OUR members do it and want EVERY SINGLE damn
> charachter added to the guild :) good thing i can teleport....
>
> -joe
> Fentus Fayspark - Mystic Alliance
> Rodcet Nife
>
> On Wed, 2 Aug 2000, drovar wrote:
>
> > > Not sure if Gaydari mentioned it be there is a queer guild on rodcet
Nife
> > > called the Mystic Alliance.

any

Warrior
> > since I've never played one.

> > drovar
